name: omnipresence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of being present or having an effect everywhere at the same time: the omnipresence of the secret police The world has grown accustomed to the omnipresence of global brands. See
omnipresent
More examplesFewer examplesWe have to accept the omnipresence of power lines in the countryside.His father was amazed by the omnipresence of computers, mobile phones and other technologies on campus.Pop stars are now measured by their omnipresence.
